scenes.description: 'How do you think we should prioritize tasks to avoid these last-minute emergencies?'

options.text: We should introduce a more systematic approach to task management, perhaps using a shared calendar.

options.text: I agree, but I'm not sure if a systematic approach will cover all aspects. Maybe we need more clarity on roles.

options.text: Honestly, some people need to step up their game. We can't manage everything for them.
